DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Venlafaxine vs. Paroxetine Panic Disorder
DOC.criteria: Meet DSM IV criterion Panic Disorder ( without agoraphobia ) least 3 month study day 1 . Have minimum 8 fullsymptom panic attack 4 week screen visit .
